text: How to prepare a delicious chicken biriyani!!
title: Come ..lets eat some new..

---

Chicken pieces
Basmati rice
Onions, tomatoes, and garlic
Arabic spices (like cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, and bay leaves)
Yogurt
Fresh coriander and mint leaves
Saffron soaked in rose water
Ghee or oil
Preparation:
Marinate the chicken: Mix chicken with yogurt, garlic paste, and Arabic spices. Let it marinate for at least an hour.
Cook the rice: Boil basmati rice with whole spices until itâ€™s 70% cooked. Drain and set aside.
Prepare the gravy: Fry onions until golden brown, add tomatoes, and cook until soft. Add marinated chicken and cook until tender.
Layering: In a large pot, layer the rice and chicken gravy. Sprinkle fresh coriander, mint leaves, and saffron water between layers.
Dum cooking: Cover the pot with a tight lid and cook on low heat for about 20-30 minutes.
